ark:/13030/qt4g62s1mf.title: A Pigeon Against The World
ark:/13030/qt4g62s1mf.description:
A Pigeon Against The World by Emily Lay
A Pigeon Against The World tells a story of a pigeon who needs to save their nest from being destroyed in the process of a demolition project. The protagonist is the pigeon and is given different decisions in how to save their nest.

ark:/13030/qt4gj2c1hm.title: The Burrito
ark:/13030/qt4gj2c1hm.description: A divorced man has to choose what to put in his burrito from an odd assortment of ingredients. The paths branch out and there are multiple endings to get.

ark:/13030/qt4gw993hq.title: Fallen
ark:/13030/qt4gw993hq.description:
I selected the word "fallen" to incorporate in my game by writing the plot based on the plain crash, which the plane has "fallen".
My goal for the game was to make the user experience multiple paths and make them fun. I hoped the player feel fun when even if you selected strange paths(such as throwing car batteries to the bear when the bear charging to you), resulting in it was not the dead end and turned out to be a good decision! I wanted to make players to encourage themselves to restart the game by themselves and experience every paths of the game. 
I added images and some passages based on the feedback.
- Added passage before the rescue team arrived
- Add multiple options for how to catch a rabbit(using oranges as a bait or use axe/knives to catch rabbit)
- You can kill a bear when you have an axe.
I have playtested several times and debugged my game.

ark:/13030/qt4hm5n6r5.title: Birthday
ark:/13030/qt4hm5n6r5.description: A man dead many times in his birthday and find the secret behind this.

ark:/13030/qt4hs94533.title: Roguelike
ark:/13030/qt4hs94533.description: You are an adventurer exploring a mysterious tomb, riddled with traps, puzzles, and monsters.  You can choose a class to provide you with unique bonuses as you traverse the tomb.

ark:/13030/qt4hz5w630.title: Quarteny Loyalty
ark:/13030/qt4hz5w630.description: Quarteny Loyalty is an interactive story where you play as a person from Quarteny, the only city on the world of endless sand, taking a job from the city's most honorable department: The Special Force. From there, you start to discover secrets that The Special Force, as well as the leaders of Quarteny, has been hiding for hundreds of years. This game aims to deliver the sense of mystery and secrecy through story telling. By making choices within the game, the player will be able to discover different endings, making replaying the game important if the player wishes to discover all secrets in the story.

ark:/13030/qt4j0011dc.title: Murder at 105
ark:/13030/qt4j0011dc.description: An unfinished detective game about a murder in a city. Noire styled

ark:/13030/qt4j1699xp.title: lonk
ark:/13030/qt4j1699xp.description: You are a bad guy trying to kill the good guys in a flat scrolling world type of game.

ark:/13030/qt4jh0w1xm.title: Color Dungeon
ark:/13030/qt4jh0w1xm.description: Top down, dungeon crawler. You're a white blob, on a journey to discover your true colors, as you move from room to room, fighting off enemies of different colors in each room. When an enemy is defeated, your color changes to get closer to theirs. Once an enemy is defeated, they drop a heart, and picking up that heart changes your color to be closer to theirs, changing your abilities to be closer to theirs as well. After developing your color, you fight the final boss, a color model.

ark:/13030/qt4jk3f0h6.title: Redemption
ark:/13030/qt4jk3f0h6.description: I hope that as the story progresses, the player can help the main character come to terms with reality and see himself as redeemed.

ark:/13030/qt4jp3x861.title: Afghan 2012
ark:/13030/qt4jp3x861.description: Afghan 2012 puts the player in the position of a convoy commander on a dangerous, time-sensitive mission. Each decision the player makes has to weigh the moral considerations against the risks of the situation. The goal is to help the player understand the difficult decisions that many have to go through while deployed, many of them deadly, and with no right answer.

ark:/13030/qt4jz7v0x0.title: Bardcore
ark:/13030/qt4jz7v0x0.description:
Bardcore is a fantasy style bullet hell where you play as a travelling Bard performing at a local Tavern; This here bard may not be fancied for playing the lute; However she sure has the ability to shoot! Dodge the hurled fruit in order to perform a most glorious song! Come hither and discover the challenges and unhappy locals that await thee! 

Artist - Lauren Nakamura
Music - Gabriel Gallegos
SFX - Carey Wang

ark:/13030/qt4k79b9v6.title: finalproject-1
ark:/13030/qt4k79b9v6.description:
For our game, my partner and I chose the word âSoulmateâ as our theme. In order to encapsulate this word, we decided to make a platformer with a bit of a twist. In our game the player is put into a calming world with platforming challenges that get progressively more difficult. In the game, the player controls 2 characters on separate âscreensâ and does their best to navigate and beat each level. To complete levels, a player must have patience, awareness, and skill in order to move on. Some obstacles players must face include, bugs that move back and forth, deadly pitfalls, spikes, and moving spike bars. Many of the tricky jumps in the game take patience to make rather than speed running it through. This allows the player to absorb more of their surrounding and hopefully feel more immersed. For our, aesthetic we went for a common looking platformer. Rather than have something sci-fi or fantastical, we wanted to use a happy and innocent look in order to capture our theme of soulmate. Because we were also limited on animation possibilities and didn't use too much text, our game is more gameplay oriented rather than story oriented.Â  Together, these elements create a serene game with mainly challenging gameplay based elements.Â Â 

As previously mentioned the goal of this game was to make a platformer that had mechanics reflecting the theme word of âsoulmateâ. Doing this reflects the reading on Metaphor vs. Mechanics and how games such as Risk, Monopoly, and Magic the Gathering all integrate their key themes into their gameplay. Personally I believe that our metaphorical mechanics is very strong. In this game we also tried to make characters that the player could also relate themselves with. Typically, when thinking of a soulmate, one tends to think about a male and female couple but to help more people relate to the game, we chose to use basic, cute stick figure looking sprites that are human. In the game there is also very basic mechanics that we went over in class.Â 

Our game is a very simple platformer at the surface but with a twist that leads to many new possibilities. Since we chose the word soulmate, we decided to use that metaphor and turn it into a new âmechanicâ by adding a second player that is bound to the first. In addition to controlling the second character, the player must watch out for the second character as the two characters move and die together. Not only does this help extend the soulmate metaphor, but it also creates new mechanics and adds depth to gameplay. In many ways the game is still similar to classic platformers such as Super Mario, in that they share common enemies and ways to die. However, since there is a second player added in our game more depth is added to this classic genre. Since both characterâs deaths are linked, this create a puzzle for the player to navigate. They must be cognizant at all times, watching and thinking about where each character will land. Although not added, more mechanics and interactions between both âscreensâ could be implemented. An idea for this could be something like a player on the top screen being able to push a box onto a button allowing the second player to have access to something. This would add a more puzzly element to the game, in turn adding even more depth overall.Â 

Initially our game was too difficult as we had gotten used to the mechanics in the game so thatâs what we mainly focused on redesigning. In our final game people said that it was just the right amount of challenging to keep them going. Some people made remarks on the only decent art on which I would have to agree. However for the most part the gameplay seemed to be the highlight as we hoped it would be. Others also liked how the mechanic of 2 people moving together was implemented but it may be interesting to see what it would be like if the game was multiplayer and if it had more interactions between the two screens. Overall I think the feedback was generally good because of the people we asked. I believe that there is still a lot of room for improvement in areas, particularly in art. Other things that could be added are more mechanics and maybe more levels for those mechanics to be placed in. Some also remarked that the end screen should be something a little more impactful that just a white screen and I agree with that.

ark:/13030/qt4m11p1j5.title: Forever September 25th
ark:/13030/qt4m11p1j5.description: A game about time loop, you realize that you are in a time loop, can you understand the loop itself and escape?

ark:/13030/qt4mp4t055.title: Tower Run
ark:/13030/qt4mp4t055.description: Tower Run is a 2d platformer where you start at the top of a few roofs as an escaped prisoner, and the objective is to kill all of the guards. The player can double jump, duck, throw ninja stars, and move around. You have to avoid the batons that the guards will throw at you if they see you. One you kill all of the guards, you win. You only have 3 hearts, and if a baton hits you you lose a heart. Falling from too high will kill the player as well. Killing all the guards makes you win!

ark:/13030/qt4mt6j32j.title: Soulmate-2
ark:/13030/qt4mt6j32j.description: I want the player to experience the horror feeling from the game and make their choice carefully.

ark:/13030/qt4n07r8jz.title: Last Night
ark:/13030/qt4n07r8jz.description:
Last Night: by Andrew Caballero
Last night is a chose your own adventure game that tells the story of a person (you) who wakes up after a wild night at a concert and cant remember much of what happened. All you know is that there is someone you have to find, but where do you start looking?

ark:/13030/qt4n27p986.title: Mystery Mansion
ark:/13030/qt4n27p986.description:
Mystery Mansion by David Amaya
You're a detective sent by "the association" to investigate the mysterious disappearance of one of their high ranking members. Your destination is a mansion where your target was last seen. However, you feel like there's something very strange about this mansion.

ark:/13030/qt4n71j2gq.title: Lost in the Dark
ark:/13030/qt4n71j2gq.description:
Lost in the Dark by Aaron Chen
Lost in the Dark is an open-map dungeon texted based game that follows a person that was transported to the dungeon without any memories and escape from the dungeon. The game has many twists and turns and aims to be confusing.

ark:/13030/qt4nh549nn.title: Panda Jump
ark:/13030/qt4nh549nn.description:
Our game is called Panda Jump, as what the name is, the main character is a Panda, which is controlled by players to move on the platform or jump onto the clouds. The theme of our game is Falling. After players win the game, the Panda will fall through all the clouds until it arrives at the floor. Players can play the game in no time limitation by clicking the buttons to play again. In total it has two levels. For each level, players need to control the Panda to jump onto the clouds to get 4 bamboos by touching them to win. After passing the first level, click on the ânext levelâ button to get to the second level Panda Jump 2 which is an upgrade version of Panda Jump. Players need to jump onto One-piece clouds without touching them in this level. The instruction of the game will show on the screen after players start each level. The red arrows are the hint of directions that the Panda could move to. Double jump in the game is enabled, so players can enjoy using the keyboard to jump.Â 

Panda Jump is a game full of Chinese elements. Firstly, the giant panda is considered as the national treasure in China. The main character Panda is an animation of the real giant panda, it has the such as the black eyes, the black ears, the small black tail, and the white belly. Secondly, the color of our game is mainly black and white, which not only match the color of the Panda but also match our goal to make this game simple and enjoyable. Comparing to the black and white background, the green âbamboosâ, red arrows and colorful texts are more obvious to players. In such a way, the instruction of the game is very clear to our audiences and it doesnât destroy the simple style we want to build up. Whatâs more, the background music of Panda Jump is an adapted version of the âSuper Marioâ. This music mixed a lot of Chinese instrument like the ancient zheng, which is slower and beautiful. Also, we add sounds which will play when the Panda gets bamboo to attract players to get more bamboos until they win.

Â 

The Core Mechanics of Panda Jump is clear. The Panda and its bamboos are nouns. Moving the Panda to the left or right and jumping or double-jumping onto the clouds to touch the bamboos are verbs. And the grammar is shown above which is the instructions. A complete game needs to be not that easy to win or lose, so we add some difficulties in the process of playing the game. For example, in each level of our game, when the Panda jump higher, the number of clouds is decreasing which means the top is the hardest to jump. Besides, according to the Blizzard Game Pillar, we design this game based on the fun of the game. We add small but clear texts to engage our audiences to have fun on it and understand the rules as fast as they see the text consisting of one or two sentences. We aim to let the players spend the shortest time to understand how to play this game, and have more time to enjoy playing the game and get the victory message. For example, when players control the Panda to touch the first bamboo in the first level and the âboomâ animation begins to play, the âscoreâ made of four empty bamboos under the cloud will be filled one showing with the rule message saying that âyou need to get all four bamboos to win this game...â. We think it is better than just showing a text before starting the game since It helps the players to understand the âgrammarâ quickly when playing the game. Playing is the best way of learning.

Â 

We were supposed to do a game about water, and our graphical game alpha is a outline that using a physical effect to make water dropping from the top. However, we change our topic and content in the process since we want to make a game that is innovative both in its style and on its goal. Since both of us are born in China and we are all familiar with Chinese culture, instead of making a game that is difficult and skillful, we are more willing to design a simple game full of details using things we are good at. As a result, we choose the Chinese style using many Chinese elements and make a game which is simple and clear. The action of our game is similar to Doodle Jump, a game controlling the characterâs direction of jumping. Comparing to Doodle Jump, our game is using the four-way buttons on the keyboard to control the character, we can control it to jump or stay, also, double-jump is enabled in our game, so the character can move farther to get where they want. The most important thing is that not like Doodle Jump that only has sounds, our game has both sounds and background music. It is important since music is a great way to attract audiences.

Â 

In the lab sections, we and other teams playtested each otherâs games and we got a lot of feedback and ideas from them. We repaired a lot of bugs appearing in the process of playtesting, also, we add some instruction texts at the beginning and some arrows to guide the players. One of the teams gave the advice that we need to emphasize the theme word,Â  so when passing each level, we set the Panda to fall through the clouds and get to the floor to call back our theme word âFallingâ. At the end of our game, after victory message shows up, we add a button âplay againâ for players to play as much as they want. All the feedback are important to us and give us a lot of ideas to improve our game. I am so willing to accept otherâs advice on our game since it is so helpful. And I have a lot of fun doing this project!

ark:/13030/qt4np1m7n0.title: Life After Life
ark:/13030/qt4np1m7n0.description: After a mass-extinction event, life goes on in the celestial planes. Will you carve a new path for yourself in the afterlife, or remain as you were?

ark:/13030/qt4p01054h.title: Traffic
ark:/13030/qt4p01054h.description:
I chose 'Traffic', and I made a story about going to university from home which is quite related to the traffic.

I set up the values 'Battery' and 'Time' so that I wanted people to check their status and to avoid bad choices that makes their status worse. It also gives the feel of phone screen, which is quite familiar.

I got a feedback from alpha.
The first one is that player need to be indicated of battery and time indicator, so I added the explanation.
The next one is that it's a little hard, so I manipulated it.
Thus I added a 'Happy Ending' which is different from 'Normal Ending' and 'Bad Ending' which still encourages players to focus on playing while not giving them the feels that the game is hard.

ark:/13030/qt4p88h74j.title: Sleep
ark:/13030/qt4p88h74j.description: You are a restless crew member wandering the deck of the ship on a sleepless night as reality and control escape their grasp.

ark:/13030/qt4rd86631.title: Salem
ark:/13030/qt4rd86631.description: Salem is a text based choose your own adventure game based on the Salem with trials but with a twist this time

ark:/13030/qt4rf3t2sz.title: Last Bite
ark:/13030/qt4rf3t2sz.description:
Survival game in which you trying to survive until help arrives.
You have a few means by which to search for food.
Not every choice is right.

ark:/13030/qt4rn2r0k5.title: you find yourself on a bus
ark:/13030/qt4rn2r0k5.description: you find yourself on a bus. get home?
tags: exploration (I'm not sure of anything besides t hat yet)

ark:/13030/qt4rp9c471.title: The impossible power
ark:/13030/qt4rp9c471.description:
The theme word I selected to incorporate is "Falling."
I wanted the player to feel accomplishment, I wanted the player to make moral decisions, I wanted the player to feel wondered, I wanted the player to be trapped in a time loop, and I wanted to evoke the falling in love.
I wanted the player to feel accomplishment, I wanted the player to make moral decisions, I wanted the player to feel wondered, I wanted the player to be trapped in a time loop, and I wanted to evoke the feeling of falling in love.

ark:/13030/qt4rv8z6b7.title: Stay on Track
ark:/13030/qt4rv8z6b7.description: It's an attempt at making a horror game with ghosts as a theme and now abandoned Southern Pacific Railroad as a motif

ark:/13030/qt4s6809r6.title: Suspicion to Ambition
ark:/13030/qt4s6809r6.description:
Suspicion to Ambition by Julie Khou
You have been married for a while, but recently, things have become strange between you and your husband. Explore your house, discover items that may be useful to you in the future. Finally, try to kill your husband without him killing you first.

ark:/13030/qt4s82957w.title: Burning Roses
ark:/13030/qt4s82957w.description:
Burning Roses aims to simulate the  inconsistencies in personality for someone with mental health challenges which in turn creates a facade for others to see and the appearance of stability. This is in contrast with what the person with those challenges is actually experiencing internally and offers a glimpse into that person's internal world.

Burning Roses is unfinished.

ark:/13030/qt4sd487hz.title: Dark Woods
ark:/13030/qt4sd487hz.description: Dark woods is a horror game which begins at a plane crash site. The goal of the game is to bring fear into the player and also test their knowledge using the process of elimination. The surroundings give deeper insight into the choices that should be made. There are a couple comedic factors but a horror comedy game is very difficult to make. The story behind the creatures is that they were genetically made by an outside government agency. This forest was the grounds where they tested them.

ark:/13030/qt4sn5v1j1.title: soulmate
ark:/13030/qt4sn5v1j1.description:
My game is about misunderstanding and depression. Rin is Sakura's best friend, or as Rin believe they are soulmate. They do have a strong relationship and share numerous secretes. However, Sakura still hides a secret about her academic life, which she suffers the most and scared to tell everyone. As time goes on this forms a misunderstanding from Rin towards Sakura, as Rin believes Sakura's teacher has been purposefully hurting her. As Sakura suicides herself, Rin's belief comes to a determination for revenge. She believes that she knows everything about Sakura since they are soulmates, and this belief finally let her to make fake evidence in accusing their teacher.
I want to let my players know the kind of misunderstanding at the end. Even though you and one are so close friends like a soulmate, you can still have some misunderstanding of him/her. They might still hide some things that they are not willing to share with you.

ark:/13030/qt4sz7h2zd.title: Exploration of my Highschool Home in Henderson Center
ark:/13030/qt4sz7h2zd.description: This Twine game explores a map of my house, giving a personal memory associated with each room. It is a tribute to the home that I had to move out of to come to UCSC, and a memoir of my years in highschool.

ark:/13030/qt4t28h1qs.title: Shipwrecked
ark:/13030/qt4t28h1qs.description:
Shipwrecked by Samuel Levin-Meer
You wake up on a boat that is sinking and must figure out how to survive. 
Your choices in the beginning of the game can impact the endings. 
Three possible endings.

ark:/13030/qt4tb1727t.title: Scurvy Seas
ark:/13030/qt4tb1727t.description:
Scurvy Seas by Mitchell Mercado
Make the right choices as a newly appointed Captain to reach the treasure at the end of your adventure.

ark:/13030/qt4tj095qk.title: Mysterious Cave
ark:/13030/qt4tj095qk.description: Its puzzle solving game in a shape shifting cave.

ark:/13030/qt4v081994.title: A Day in the Life of a Rabbit Owner
ark:/13030/qt4v081994.description: A Day in the Life of a Rabbit Owner is exactly what the name suggests, it is a game that portrays the average day of someone who owns a rabbit. The setting for my game takes place in a home setting, where the main character (the player) would wake up from his sleep and make choices throughout the day that reflect the presence of a pet bunny and their high maintenance requirements.
tags: Rabbit Game Life Day Normal Slice of Life

ark:/13030/qt4v12x30z.title: Dark Forest
ark:/13030/qt4v12x30z.description: You wake up in a dark place and don't know why you are in a dangerous forest. Only good elfin may help you. Only with wisdom, courage and luck can you escape from the forest.

ark:/13030/qt4v4501w4.title: Friday, March 16th
ark:/13030/qt4v4501w4.description: It is a loop where the player has to find things through the loops to keep their friend alive.

ark:/13030/qt4v8864tx.title: istg
ark:/13030/qt4v8864tx.description: searching for a new inhabitable planet with an earth history nerd.

ark:/13030/qt4vw2x001.title: Are you a Real Slug?!
ark:/13030/qt4vw2x001.description:
The game is a representation of Santa Cruz and specifically inspired from my
personal discovery and explorations of various interesting yet not common places
around campus and the city in general. The game aims to provide a virtual
introduction experience to those new to Santa Cruz or those who cannot or are yet
to explore the hidden wonders within Santa Cruz.

ark:/13030/qt4w37g200.title: Warrior
ark:/13030/qt4w37g200.description: Born to a poor family and only child

ark:/13030/qt4wd6s33z.title: Soulmate
ark:/13030/qt4wd6s33z.description:
My theme word is Soulmate, but my "soulmate" is literally Soul-mate, I use the god of death to be the player's soulmate and sign contract to connects them together.
I wanted the player to explore the new cursed world and find the best ending, there are 4 different endings and players will still have a chance to win the game even they did not pick the best choices.

ark:/13030/qt4wj9z141.title: CYA-40 v1.0
ark:/13030/qt4wj9z141.description:
CYA-40 v1.0 by Emily Applewhite
CYA-40 v1.0 is a lighthearted game in which you sit down to an old machine in order to read a Choose Your Own Adventure novel. However, as you'll come to find, the machine is broken and you'll have to help fix it in order to get it back up and running. However, as you'll come to find, there's more that this thing can do than just run Choose Your Own Adventure novels...

ark:/13030/qt4x17b4jt.title: Pokemon Day
ark:/13030/qt4x17b4jt.description:
My game is an adaptation of regular day life but while having the original 3
starter Pokemon Charizard, Blastoise, and Venusaur by your side
throughout the day. The game is set in a generic city similar to New York
City.

ark:/13030/qt4x56w703.title: Forgotten Relationship
ark:/13030/qt4x56w703.description: A simple mystery game involved with looping memories, once you figure out the simple mystery, a much deeper story about your faltering relationship with your parents appears.

ark:/13030/qt4xf21622.title: Transitory
ark:/13030/qt4xf21622.description:
Transitory by AJ Blackadar
You slept through your alarm and need to get ready for work, but something is wrong. A game about daydreaming against your better judgement. Five endings.

ark:/13030/qt4zh6x5rh.title: What a Wonderful World
ark:/13030/qt4zh6x5rh.description: What a Wonderful World is a text-based adventure game in which you play as a backpacker who chooses between progress and appreciation for the world around them.

ark:/13030/qt4zn1x9dr.title: Void room
ark:/13030/qt4zn1x9dr.description:
When you awake up and look around, there is a total unknown room.
 What can you find in this room or what clue can you seek from someplace?

ark:/13030/qt4zx0j28x.description:
I incorporated the word deer as the main theme.
My design goal was to make a mysterious thriller with only 2 good endings with 10 endings that can end up bad. The placer needs to make hard choices, one that might never make, in order to make it to one of the 2 good endings.  I wanted to evoke the feeling of fear and helplessness. Sometimes once the player commits to a choice, there no turning back-the player just slowly sees him/herself going into the bad endings.

ark:/13030/qt5000v89j.title: On the Run (No Escape)
ark:/13030/qt5000v89j.description: On the Run (No Escape) follows a man on the run from the police. Can the protagonist make the correct decisions to get out of impending jail time?

ark:/13030/qt5066v1ss.title: Light Void
ark:/13030/qt5066v1ss.description:
Light Void by Jared Tran
Light Void tells the story of a student stuck in their house due to the devastation caused by a deadly virus. When they notice strange activity going on nearby, they explore the area and find themselves on an unusual adventure. Fun but weird.

ark:/13030/qt50f803qs.title: The Life of a Man
ark:/13030/qt50f803qs.description: The Life of a Man is a game about the fragility of life. One mistake can lead to death and in the end everything leads to death. In this game, the player platforms through levels encountering obstacles and collecting coins to increase their score/wealth.

ark:/13030/qt50g5w8np.title: Choose what you want to do and find what will happen
ark:/13030/qt50g5w8np.description: Choose what you want to do and find what will happen

ark:/13030/qt50m3m5hg.title: The Cure
ark:/13030/qt50m3m5hg.description: A satirical take on some conspiracy theories surrounding the current political landscape of the year 2021. The game is an endless bullet hell shooter where you play a scientist vaccinating hordes of angry anti-maskers. You can utilize your 5G Ultra-wide band phone to stun the anti-maskers. Vaccinated anti-maskers spread the 5G signal from the chip implanted in them by the COVID-19 vaccine. (mini-tutorial: arrow keys, left click and right click)

ark:/13030/qt5198w3v2.title: A Day in My Life
ark:/13030/qt5198w3v2.description: A Day in My Life is an text game based on the personal experiences of someone with depression, anxiety, and live as a transgender male. You prepare yourself for the day, you are given and make various choices dependent on your previous ones, and later reflect on how you feel by the end of the day. This game aims to show people who may not relate to the feelings of those with mental health issues what it is like and allow them to take a step in someone else's shoes.

ark:/13030/qt51s8w95x.title: Longan
ark:/13030/qt51s8w95x.description: A game about a person find his true blood.

ark:/13030/qt5278v6m6.title: Nightwalk
ark:/13030/qt5278v6m6.description: Nightwalk is a game for people who are afraid to fall in love.

ark:/13030/qt52h638gz.title: Phubbing
ark:/13030/qt52h638gz.description:
Theme: I selected the theme "falling." I incorporate this word to let the player fall into tree hollows to experience time travel.
Design/experience/fantasy goal: I wanted the player to realize that reduce the time we spend on smartphones would improve our relationship with our families and friends.
Added comment: the fantasy setting at the beginning of the story aimed at comparing two different kinds of memories: the beautiful one stores the good memories without  smartphones, the lifeless one stores the bad memories caused by attaching to smartphones. I wanted the player to travel to this fantasy world to alert them to the problem of overusing smartphones

ark:/13030/qt52h7x3zn.title: The Frog
ark:/13030/qt52h7x3zn.description: A story about finding true love... as a frog.

ark:/13030/qt52m4w10c.title: The sunset
ark:/13030/qt52m4w10c.description: The main character will suddenly hear a time countdown voice which nobody else can here. Therefore, you task is to find out what cause it and what will happen if the time goes to zero.

ark:/13030/qt53g3p297.title: Repressed
ark:/13030/qt53g3p297.description:
Repressed by Sabrina Pan
Repressed takes place in a child's dream, where they must relive a traumatic event in their past in order to wake up. Failing to remember results in an endless, looping cycle in the dream world...

ark:/13030/qt53h8h6s7.title: Funny Yellow Dog Game
ark:/13030/qt53h8h6s7.description: Funny Yellow Dog Game features internet meme dog Cheems, who goes on a short adventure through a dog park. Navigate the mazes and fend off the vicious Henries with your trusty bonking bat and explosive cheeseburgers.

ark:/13030/qt549935d9.title: A terrible Incident! Oh No!
ark:/13030/qt549935d9.description: You are a person with superpowers looking for their lost sibling. You must choose what your superpower is.

ark:/13030/qt54w688rs.title: The Hunt
ark:/13030/qt54w688rs.description: The Hunt by Avery Weibel. The hunt is an exploration game where you traverse a monstrous castle while hunting a vampire. You choose your equipment on each playthrough and can access different areas of the castle depending on these choices. Your choices are the difference between life and death, and each playthrough will bring you closer to victory as you unravel the castle's secrets...

ark:/13030/qt5544n8wv.title: The Cursed Tomb
ark:/13030/qt5544n8wv.description:
The Cursed Tomb by Devin Gaughan
The Cursed Tomb is about an up and coming explorer. You discover this ancient tomb that is rumored to hold priceless artifacts. In the tomb lies many secrets that will leave you questioning whether this is a good idea. Embark on an adventure with secrets and monsters beyond your imagination.

ark:/13030/qt55n4v42x.title: Sorcerer
ark:/13030/qt55n4v42x.description:
Sorcerer by Matthew Mitchell
Sorcerer is an interactive fiction game where you play as an apprentice to a witch. The game is about the character's quest to learn different types of magic. The player can choose two of four types of magic on any given play through to learn. There is one ending, but five slight variations of that same ending.

ark:/13030/qt5612n9gf.title: Gun Dungeon
ark:/13030/qt5612n9gf.description: Gun Dungeon is a game where the player must assemble their gun pieces to fight off a oncoming threat of a robot attack on a underground chamber housing some of the last of humanity hiding from the robots that have taken over the world.

ark:/13030/qt5665v2dj.title: Biolab75
ark:/13030/qt5665v2dj.description: 2D Topdown shooter. Survive as long as possible.

ark:/13030/qt56c1c7rc.title: The Concert
ark:/13030/qt56c1c7rc.description: It's about a guy and his 5 friends who go to a concert. They decide to play a game that leads to an unfortunate outcome and a creature is out to get them. You are in 3rd person perspective deciding what happens in the story

ark:/13030/qt575955jg.title: The Quarantine Portal
ark:/13030/qt575955jg.description: In this interactive game, you are a fellow student that is going through the same cycle of quarantine at home until one day you're forced to take a walk outside. While pursuing an unknown route, you seem to find you self lost. You try to find your way back but then...BAM!... you fall into a portal of fairytales where you are challenged to find their happily ever after to return back home.

ark:/13030/qt57c375w0.title: The Empty Planet
ark:/13030/qt57c375w0.description: A link-based game about human exploration of a new planet.

ark:/13030/qt57d8q3h1.title: Potion
ark:/13030/qt57d8q3h1.description:
Potion by Andrew Mangal. 

In this game, you play the role of a knight who stole his fiancÃ©e from her kingdom. During their escape, she was wounded by a poisonous arrow and now has 4 days to live. You stop by an abandoned castle that you think might have the potion. You have four days. The game is primarily about your relationship with your fiancÃ©e, and how you interact with her changes how the story progresses and concludes. Do you snap under the pressure? Do you fight to stay calm? Or do you anxiously wear yourself out through constant searching?

ark:/13030/qt57z9b68p.title: Redo Of Dreams
ark:/13030/qt57z9b68p.description: You are a person coming home from work. After a long day you make decisions that predetermine which dream you dive into. There are 3 possible dreams and explore them as you choose your own adventure.

ark:/13030/qt580043qv.title: Hole in Time
ark:/13030/qt580043qv.description:
Hole in Time by Thomas Noell
Hole in Time is about a commander whose ship is caught in a black hole's gravity and is being attacked by pirates. By helping the whole crew on the ship out, you can escape.

ark:/13030/qt5887j0q1.title: The Cycle
ark:/13030/qt5887j0q1.description:
The Cycle by Michael Remorin
The Cycle is an interactive game where you play as a lazy college student, who has let go of all their responsibilities. You are transported into their room and are given a series of objects to interact with. If the student becomes a functioning adult in society is entirely up to the player. This game aims to show how the small choices in life can have lasting impacts on someone's life, whether for the better or for the worse.

ark:/13030/qt58t4z63m.title: A few small favors
ark:/13030/qt58t4z63m.description: silly little fetch quest. You're a mad scientist who needs a rubber hose

ark:/13030/qt58v8v262.title: Dementophobia
ark:/13030/qt58v8v262.description:
Dementophobia by Justin Satriano
Dementophobia is about an insane person who is constantly tempted by his dark side to commit heinous crimes. This game aims to create a feeling of insanity, and the draw it creates between the paths that are presented.

ark:/13030/qt58z538qm.description:
Theme: Deer virus. I choose the theme word "deer". The whole story is related to "Deer virus". It works as a zombie virus.
Goal: I wanted the game to make the player feel the tension. Player has to decide how to solve the problem, and also imagine the scene. This is the reason why I choose the background of the game as our college.

ark:/13030/qt5959r6n0.title: Soulmate Story
ark:/13030/qt5959r6n0.description: The topic of this game is soulmate, so I try to use friends in this game. I am trying to make people to control their love life on their own and do not feel stress on this game. Enjoy it.

ark:/13030/qt5982z9v0.title: Muskrat Simulator
ark:/13030/qt5982z9v0.description: Find your one true Muskrat love in this interactive, well... interaction simulator! Your answers will decide if you find your Muskrat tango partner, or perish of a morbid Muskrat death. Trust your gut, answer truthfully, and see where it takes you... Play through to meet all possible Muskrats!

ark:/13030/qt59m4f7c2.title: Clown to Down
ark:/13030/qt59m4f7c2.description:
Clown to Down by Jennifer Honeywell
You are afraid of clowns. You are afraid of clowns and you find yourself in the wreckage of a newly devastated carnival. You re-evaluate your relationship with clowns and with yourself.

ark:/13030/qt59p2d6kq.title: Porter Robinson: The Second Sky
ark:/13030/qt59p2d6kq.description: Porter Robinson: The Second Sky emulates a festival experience. You are on a time crunch to see Porter Robinson, but along the way, you run into a few predicaments. Your goal is to reach the main stage by 6:00PM or you won't get to see Porter's last World set. This game will test your loyalty to your friends and your values.

ark:/13030/qt5b3184w5.title: Dream Room
ark:/13030/qt5b3184w5.description: Dream Room is a fictional exploration game where you are exploring a magical room. You are presented with several interesting and familiar objects, from closets to potions, that you have the freedom to explore individually at your own pace and choice.

ark:/13030/qt5bx476bd.title: Azamon Escape
ark:/13030/qt5bx476bd.description:
Azamon Escape by Oliver Richardson
As a factory worker in a dystopian world ruled by corporations, you must make decisions to 
try to escape from the prison like workplace that is Azamon. you will have to be careful with 
the choices you make as a wrong choice can hurt not just you but also the people around you.

ark:/13030/qt5c59815g.title: The Barf Question
ark:/13030/qt5c59815g.description: A time loop puzzle game where every day, a person throws up on you inexplicably. You have to figure out why and stop it.

ark:/13030/qt5c7506t5.title: In Gods Image
ark:/13030/qt5c7506t5.description:
In Gods Image by Benjamin E. Pratt
In Gods Image is a tale of two siblings.
One is Lucifer, arch-demon and king of hell.
The other is Gabriel, absolute lord of heaven.
Which will you choose? How will you rule? Who will you kill?

ark:/13030/qt5d46j0hd.title: Fire Fighters
ark:/13030/qt5d46j0hd.description: Fire Fighters is a reskin and reimplementation of Space Invaders, with the added addition of levels and a global high score. Players are tasked with extinguishing upcoming threats of forest fires (from burning trees) and are challenged with incremental difficulty between an infinite set of levels. Players must take on the role of a firefighter, by shooting water projectiles and dodging fire projectiles, and resemble heroes defending the people and nature around them during a wildfire crisis. Our game aims to spread awareness about the wildfire crisis in California and around the world, along with the ongoing climate crisis.

ark:/13030/qt5d80t769.title: florescence
ark:/13030/qt5d80t769.description: In the midst of turmoil between dreams and reality, you are plagued by a disease which steadily produces flowers in your lungs, causing you to cough up petals until your lungs reach capacity.

ark:/13030/qt5db6h6qk.title: Deer
ark:/13030/qt5db6h6qk.description:
I wanted this to be a thriller/horror game. The main character is someone who is grieving and feels like they don't have much of a purpose after losing their job and family. I want players to be able to pick a path for this person, even though the decisions may be hard. Of course, some paths lead to scarier things than others...

Content warning: violence, blood, gore, existentialism, swearing

ark:/13030/qt5df4c1fb.title: Tough Dating
ark:/13030/qt5df4c1fb.description: You have a dating with your girlfriend. You need make the choices to succeed this dating. Don't lost your girlfriend!

ark:/13030/qt5dk2z4wn.title: Lattice System
ark:/13030/qt5dk2z4wn.description: Your ship has landed in an alien star system where strange flora, fauna and phenomena abound. Will you and your intrepid cremate thrive or fail to survive?
tags: Space Alien Adventure Cheerful Silly Planet

ark:/13030/qt5ds0h3h6.title: Protect Yourself
ark:/13030/qt5ds0h3h6.description: You are a normal person with some habits in the life. One day you come home, you feel strange by walking into your house. Find ways to protect yourself

ark:/13030/qt5dx765jr.title: No Planet B
ark:/13030/qt5dx765jr.description:
No Planet B by Nicolas Guevara
No Planet B places you in the shoes of an animal 30 years in the future, after humans have left the planet but are now returning as they could find no suitable planet. The game attempts to relay the message that there is no Planet B while also maintaining a less serious game.

ark:/13030/qt5f2848s4.title: Camping Adventure
ark:/13030/qt5f2848s4.description: My game is about a group of friends who go camping and their encounter with something that they did not expect. It is made to feel like you are actually in the game yourself.

ark:/13030/qt5f6418jn.title: relation
ark:/13030/qt5f6418jn.description:
relation by Rachel Trieu
You're leaving for college 3,000 miles away from Riley, your significant other, into a dorm with roommate Jo. Will distance make the heart grow fonder, or bitter?

ark:/13030/qt5g21d14n.title: Twin Blades
ark:/13030/qt5g21d14n.description: Twin Blades is an adaptation of a work in progress story in which a country attempting reunification undergoes invasion, leaving its hope to the heirs of each of the country's two states. In this game, however, the player takes on the role of a nameless soldier, who must navigate the chaos of the war, making important choices along the way, potentially deviating from the original story. The game's story is one whose themes ambition, loyalty, trust, and war.

ark:/13030/qt5g73v6fz.title: Mort Voc Valley
ark:/13030/qt5g73v6fz.description:
Mort Voc Valley by Will Messick.
Mort Voc Valley tells the story of a mysterious curse that befalls the the titular valley. You the protagonist are given three days to save the inhabits of the valley. Although, there is more to this valley then meets the eye. The player will uncover the hidden truth of Mort Voc, or die trying.

ark:/13030/qt5gq1z225.title: Echoes in the Dark
ark:/13030/qt5gq1z225.description: You are an explorer on an alien planet looking for the source of a mysterious signal.

ark:/13030/qt5gt483mr.title: The Hand of a Phantom
ark:/13030/qt5gt483mr.description: Travel back and forth in time

ark:/13030/qt5gv961n8.title: Overboard
ark:/13030/qt5gv961n8.description:
Overboard by James Taliaferro
Overboard is a link-based branching narrative game with a nautical theme.
The player begins by fleeing pursuers by stowing away on a ship, and the story continues to branch as the player makes more choices. Through their choices, the player character begins to make something substantial out of their life. 
The game tests out the many types of mechanics that can be created with hyperlinks alone.

ark:/13030/qt5h15n405.title: A Deal with the Devil
ark:/13030/qt5h15n405.description: You make a deal with the devil and have to re learn your forgotten greatest desire before you go insane.

ark:/13030/qt5h44n3rz.title: Traffic Soulmate Falling Deer
ark:/13030/qt5h44n3rz.description:
Intended user experience is :
By using actual photos, he increased his immersion in games and improved readability through various text effects and style changes. Therefore, the player can focus on the game a little more.

ark:/13030/qt5hk993tw.title: The Invasion
ark:/13030/qt5hk993tw.description:
The Invasion by Rafael Calderon
You are a soldier that wakes up after an explosion. After exploring your surroundings, you find out the Earth has been invaded by aliens known as The Enlightened. You must figure out how to defeat them and save the Earth.

ark:/13030/qt5jf9g5pv.title: Dual Choice
ark:/13030/qt5jf9g5pv.description:
Dual Choice by Nicholas Miller
Dual choice tells two stories simultaneously, while only one decision can be made for both stories. One seeks to find his lost friend in the wilderness, the other a veteran detective tracking his resent case. What choices will allow both to succeed? Think hard and be brave.

ark:/13030/qt5jj791v5.title: Campground Survival
ark:/13030/qt5jj791v5.description: Campground Survival is a interactive adventure where a group of friends gets stranded in the woods while on a camping trip. The player serves as a shot caller for the group. It is up to them to help everyone escape and get to safety.

ark:/13030/qt5jm2d7dd.title: Reflection of Society
ark:/13030/qt5jm2d7dd.description:
Reflection of Society by Jagdish Bal
Reflection of Society is a story that tells the story of oppression in a society of pandas, essentially it is meant to provide the player with a reflection of their actions in relation to discrimination throughout the story. 
They have the choice to play as the oppressed or the oppressors, both of which yield different story aspects in this society. 
There are multiple endings which correlate to the user's decisions but ultimately the decision of how they reach each ending is up to the player.

ark:/13030/qt5k00p78j.title: You are a sword.
ark:/13030/qt5k00p78j.description: You are a sword. You are a weapon, a tool. An extension of the hand that wields you, with no will of your own. In this game, though the player does have control over the narrative, exactly HOW they are supposed to exert that control is unclear...what kind of sword will you be?

ark:/13030/qt5kd4h86b.title: Ratz
ark:/13030/qt5kd4h86b.description: Three kids at summer camp venture out into the woods to find a man who they were told lives there.

ark:/13030/qt5km4f52s.title: A Eulogy Forgotten
ark:/13030/qt5km4f52s.description: A Eulogy Forgotten is an interactive fiction take on the haunted house genre. The player explores an old building, potentially discovering a ghost and perhaps more. Maybe they will even learn something about themselves in their search.

ark:/13030/qt5m05v2h6.title: Kingdom Rule
ark:/13030/qt5m05v2h6.description: Will you conquer or live in peace? Kingdom Rule is a game that allows the player to choose their path in ruling. However, some may find that the road to power can be dangerous and destructive.

ark:/13030/qt5mj8n59j.title: Choose Your Own Fruitventure
ark:/13030/qt5mj8n59j.description: The protagonist awakes as a fruit of unknown species who gathers clues about themself through helping others and by re-learning the use of their senses. Chaos follows.

ark:/13030/qt5mp7j6vd.title: The Secret Life of Cats
ark:/13030/qt5mp7j6vd.description: In this game you decide to follow your cat, Patrick, outside to see where he excitedly ran off to.

ark:/13030/qt5mx5709f.title: Injection
ark:/13030/qt5mx5709f.description: My game Injection aims to present a fiction where the United States is at war with Russia and experimentation is being done on test subjects to make them super human. The player's role is to escape their cell and learn more about why they are enduring such suffering using the abilities given to them as a consequence of experimentation.

ark:/13030/qt5nm9m8w1.title: Continuum
ark:/13030/qt5nm9m8w1.description:
Continuum by Sarah Nodelman
Waking up from a coma, you find yourself trapped in a human experimentation lab controlled by a powerful AI. Move through the game to undergo various treatments and their corresponding outcomes.Take a wrong turn and you just might find yourself back at the start.  But will you ever get out?

ark:/13030/qt5nz8g541.title: The Hospitalization
ark:/13030/qt5nz8g541.description: The Hospitalization tells a story of a high school student falling ill to a brain infection and contracting paralysis on the right side of their body. The game follows the student through their arduous recovery. How will the player approach their therapy? What will the player learn or not learn throughout their journey?

ark:/13030/qt5pk3f30m.title: The Quest for the S'mores
ark:/13030/qt5pk3f30m.description:
The Quest for the S'more by Alexander Robert
You play as Jesse who is going on their first camping trip with their friends. Throughout the story Jesse struggles with an ongoing internal conflict about perfectionism which manifests in the form of a quest. The game aims to show the thoughts and feelings of someone prone to self-hate, anxiety and the consequences of resisting or giving into those thoughts and emotions. There are five endings.

ark:/13030/qt5px100qz.title: Don't Let the Dream Die
ark:/13030/qt5px100qz.description: The game revolves about a professional soccer player that has not obtain a single minute of playing time during his shoot career. Therefore, the player is exposed to a dilemma to quit the dream or fight fair or unfair for time.The outcome is tragically if player plays unfair.

ark:/13030/qt5q35z7s9.title: School Life
ark:/13030/qt5q35z7s9.description: In this game, you will go through latter end of high school, apply to a college, try survive and succeed in your first year, and see what happens after you graduate. Will you become have a successful career and find a spouse, or will you drop out and be doomed to perpetually working minimum wage jobs?

ark:/13030/qt5qn371gj.title: The Moor
ark:/13030/qt5qn371gj.description:
The Moor by Sasank Madineni
The Moor is a short surreal experience where you play as yourself, as you wake up in a small cabin in the middle of nowhere.

ark:/13030/qt5qt1m2bg.title: Set in Stone
ark:/13030/qt5qt1m2bg.description: Set in Stone is a short text-based game revolving around a sentient rock who is fed up with his lonely, repetitive lifestyle and yearns for change. Journey with this rock as it vividly dreams of what could beâ and find out where the rock ends up based on the decisions made in the rock's dreams.

ark:/13030/qt5r02w6n5.title: The Night Train
ark:/13030/qt5r02w6n5.description:
I choose the word 'traffic ' for my theme.
All events are happening on a train, which is a form of traffic.
I wanted the player to feel claustrophobic. The train is a closed space. You cannot escape the situation inside unless it stops at any station.
SPOILER:
I wanted the player to explore various endings, including the haunting hidden ending.

ark:/13030/qt5r11f9xm.title: Totally Accurate Cooking Simulator
ark:/13030/qt5r11f9xm.description: Totally Accurate Cooking Simulator challenges you to prepare the ultimate dish. Will you create a masterpiece that will reign above all? Or will you find yourself creating a disastrous kitchen nightmare? Explore your options in the kitchen and traverse through 20+ strange endings.

ark:/13030/qt5r33v8zt.title: Temple Escape
ark:/13030/qt5r33v8zt.description:
Temple Escape is a top-down puzzle game with tile based movement. 
You, a great explorer, have just traveled to South America to explore a long lost mountain temple that you've located via satellite. You found what you were looking for: a ridiculously heavy slab of rock called the Statue of Akamentu, said to contain a precious metal that can be found nowhere else on Earth. The statue is much too heavy for you to lift, so you slide it across the floor towards the exit. As you do, the ground shakes and the exit collapses, trapping you inside. Now you must push the statue through the treacherous and icy corridors in an attempt to escape.

ark:/13030/qt5r961064.title: New Job For A Middle-Aged
ark:/13030/qt5r961064.description: You are a middle-aged who divorced and lost your job. Your goal is to choose a job, dealing with everything happens on your way to work, and find a source of income. This game aims to show the importance of being honest and careful, and the difficulty of working in the society.

ark:/13030/qt5s3227d5.title: Yurei
ark:/13030/qt5s3227d5.description: You are a teen student who will have your world changed by a mysterious girl. Yurei is a click-based game where you are given choices to continue the story or to die. As you click one page at a time, it will reveal bits of pieces of the world.  The world is based off of Japan, with a hint of fantasy. There are demons and powers given. There is also an Anxiety Bar, which decreases or increases depending on your choices. To panic or to stay calm, it is your choice.

ark:/13030/qt5sk0k5qr.title: Compeesure
ark:/13030/qt5sk0k5qr.description: After embarrassing yourself while watching a horror movie with your friend, you try to prove your courage by exploring a mysterious tower in the swamp without losing your composure.

ark:/13030/qt5sm1h0wt.title: Tiny Robot
ark:/13030/qt5sm1h0wt.description: Tiny Robot must defeat Hulk Hogan to avenge is dead brother

ark:/13030/qt5sr2j4rw.title: Little Old Lady
ark:/13030/qt5sr2j4rw.description: The protagonist wakes up from their bed and heads downstairs. They notice that the living room doesnt look the same and that there is no television. An older woman peeks out from the kitchen and says,  Good morning dear. A fine day isn't it?. Who is this lady ? Where are you ?

ark:/13030/qt5t6062nx.title: Museum Robbery
ark:/13030/qt5t6062nx.description:
Museum Robbery by Rameses Santiago
You're a robber trying to rob a museum, however, the police got wind of you and are coming to get you.
How much do you take? 
How long will you stay?
Will you even try at all?

ark:/13030/qt5td229xc.title: A Trip to the Grocery Store
ark:/13030/qt5td229xc.description: A stoner-comedy adventure, in which you find yourself traveling to the grocery store after suffering from a severe case of the munchies. What seems like a simple journey quickly turns into a wacky fantasy, complete with memes and gnomes. Will you seize the best chips and the finest cereal? Or will you fail at the hands of cops, grandmas, and gnomes? Did I mention gnomes?

ark:/13030/qt5tk6f6vf.title: The Facility
ark:/13030/qt5tk6f6vf.description: The Facility is a action escape game that takes place in a dystopian future.

ark:/13030/qt5tp2n35b.title: Another day, another dollar
ark:/13030/qt5tp2n35b.description:
Another day, another dollar by Alex Mintz
Another day, another dollar is an interactive choice game where the player wakes up for a day of work and must make mundane and simple choices to progress, such as when to wake up, what to eat, how fast to drive, etc. The catch is, your boss is very stingy and any little thing could possibly upset him, so the player must be very careful with decisions to try to keep their boss happy, thus winning the game.

ark:/13030/qt5v01c9td.title: The Lone Wolf
ark:/13030/qt5v01c9td.description: The Lone Wolf is a story that places the player as an elite soldier, Nico Sova, behind enemy lines on the war torn planet of Valore. The planet's soldiers, Vallorians are up against the invading Axios planet, and Nico Sova is behind Vallorian lines, and must make his way back to his Axios team, the Wolf Battalion. Will you reunite with your squad? Or will you become a prisoner of war to the Vallorian army?

ark:/13030/qt5v0672b9.title: The Lighthouse
ark:/13030/qt5v0672b9.description: This game is strictly fiction. I was inspired by the movie descent and the "vampire-esque" monster. My goal of this game it to freak out the players as much as possible, using pictures from the movie Descent.

ark:/13030/qt5v18290s.title: Spoopy Forest
ark:/13030/qt5v18290s.description: Have you ever found yourself running away from monsters that spawn endlessly from portals, in the middle of a creepy forest?!?! Well, in Spoopy Forest, you better be ready, because if you are not, the spoopiness will get the best of you. Players must survive against monsters that chase them wherever they go, and destroy the portals to stop the monsters from spawning, in order to make it out alive.

ark:/13030/qt5vf7z8vf.title: Concrete and Glass
ark:/13030/qt5vf7z8vf.description: A sci-fi link-based game in which players take on the role of a human colonist on a planet full of enslaved aliens. They must choose what is more important to them: justice, or peace.

ark:/13030/qt5vs8x7n1.title: Friendzone to Endzone
ark:/13030/qt5vs8x7n1.description: The protagonist goes on a road trip with her best friend. The player makes choices which could lead to a potential romance in one reality or they continue with their lives as friends at the end of the trip in another reality.

ark:/13030/qt5x81d3mf.title: Soulmate2Love
ark:/13030/qt5x81d3mf.description:
I designed the game so that the player can choose between various paths. Also, although this is a simple game, I considered the correlation so that players' choices could be added and lead to results. I agree with that it's a bit childish game, but the user will surely feel pleasure.

My theme: Falling, Soulmate
I made a game based on my experience of feeling the love from a close friend(soulmate).

ark:/13030/qt5xv4c0r2.title: Cut Out Poetry
ark:/13030/qt5xv4c0r2.description: In lieu of writing an essay due very soon, the player finds some possible inspiration in picking three random quotes from the selection of books on their desk to make a poem.

ark:/13030/qt5zn4n54f.title: fANTasy
ark:/13030/qt5zn4n54f.description: In fANTasy you are the fearless leader of your ant colony. You have been orchestrating an amazing kitchen invasion for weeks with your colony, but you also had a very vivid dream about other adventures. Your colony looks to you to make the decisions for the good of the colony.

ark:/13030/qt6033w4q5.title: Turtle Ducks
ark:/13030/qt6033w4q5.description: Play as the Mama Turtle Duck and help her collect her turtle ducklings as they pop up on the pond! Accompanied by cute and catchy 8-bit music, collect as many as you can before crashing into the rocks and lily pads, or it's game over!

ark:/13030/qt604828jk.title: The Crimson Room
ark:/13030/qt604828jk.description: You are trapped in a room in a series of color room and you must find a way out.

ark:/13030/qt60b8k4dc.title: Cramming
ark:/13030/qt60b8k4dc.description:
Cramming by Sherry Luo
The game is an interactive fiction where you play as a high school student cramming for an upcoming exam. This game aims to simulate the stress of the students and the annoying thoughts that might go through their mind as they are trying to study.

ark:/13030/qt60c3f6d1.title: The Tomb
ark:/13030/qt60c3f6d1.description: The Tomb is a story about an expedition to uncover a ruin, the player is simply along for the ride, with little knowledge of the required fields. The game emphasizes social anxiety and a feeling of being unable to belong in a group.

ark:/13030/qt60q542wq.title: A Guardsman's Journey
ark:/13030/qt60q542wq.description: Set in the Warhammer 40k universe, the player must decide whether or not they will become a member of the Imperial Guard, and deal with the consequences of their decisions.

ark:/13030/qt60q612gn.title: Ezelia's Elaborate Escape
ark:/13030/qt60q612gn.description: Ezelia, a girl with powers she doesn't know how to harness, has been captured by the evil wizard Dramodus. She must escape with the help of other prisoners, and seek out her parents.

ark:/13030/qt62k7k82b.title: Goblin Hunt
ark:/13030/qt62k7k82b.description: You are playing as an adventurer who's desperate of money. You see on the Quest Board a quest about a man getting kidnapped by goblins. You can take on this quest alone or with a companion.

ark:/13030/qt62v1z8d5.title: The "Soul" Photo Studio
ark:/13030/qt62v1z8d5.description: This game synthesizes the elements of decoding, adventure and suspense in the building of a photo studio, which is about how to escape from this building. The player would face with different puzzles then try to figure out in order to success at the correct challenge to the next game point.

ark:/13030/qt6304g26h.title: The Horror Hunt
ark:/13030/qt6304g26h.description: The Horror Hunt is a game where you romance girls in a spooky forest setting.

ark:/13030/qt6340p2jf.title: Investigation
ark:/13030/qt6340p2jf.description: You are someone who's best friend was found dead and the police ruled it as a suicide, but you have your doubts. So you decide to go to your friends house to investigate and try to find out what really happened.

ark:/13030/qt6341z6z1.title: Beta
ark:/13030/qt6341z6z1.description:
Our team designed this game based on the theme word Traffic. The main reason about this is that Traffic could be an easy theme to create game. It is a simple game, but we actually met lots of difficulties during the process. The final project actually has huge differences with what I thought.

For example, at the beginning, to best express the theme word we chose, we decided to use elements like little cars and a highway to construct it. In our game, players just need to use arrow keys to control. In my mind, the motion of our little red car should be regular. There are 4 lanes in the highway. When player press left or right bottom, the red car should only move one lane and also the same distance. We tried to let it move like 50 on the X coordination, but itâs seems stupid when the car moves and has some conflict with other settings. Therefore, we finally changed to the way that move as much as players want.

There are some other kind of vehicles like police cars and some other color ones as well, these are what players need to avoid in our game. We used to put them on arranged places on a long highway which used to provide extent playable time. The difficulty change will increase or decrease those arranged cars. However, I thought thatâs boring if someone want to play it again, so we changed the background to a loop and randomly create vehicles on highway. Difficulties will increase with time goes on and reach a maximum. Also, we used to have an end point on the highway, we removed it when we decided to loop the background. Under this circumstance, there is no winning condition and no way to win this game. We just set a limit life and a score based on time. In other words, players need to do their best to survive on this highway.

When we tested the game, I found our game is more playable then the initial goal. The red car used to be only allowed to drive on 4 lanes, but now I can control it avoid other vehicles with a very close distance. Also, sometimes it seems surrounded by other vehicles, but they will destroy themselves by collisions. These elements make our game more playable.

Xuqi and Kaisen usually say our game looks like drive on highway 17, but I donât agree with them. Highway 17 is dangerous because of its winding topography, but in our game is dangerous because of those rude vehicles. We set those 3 different vehicles with three different speed. When two of them collide with each other, both will be destroyed and explosive. We hope people will know how dangerous it is when driving rude.

We played lots of examples in construct 3 and see how it works to make our game better and innovative. The initial long highway is a typical example. We didnât know how to make a highway at the beginning until we played the game Glokar. It uses several repeated backgrounds to make the playable time long enough. So we make our game just like it, but unfortunately we found this method is not suitable for our game. All of those games are awesome whatever on graph or entertainment. We try to learn how to make a game through their eventsheets, but some of them are too difficult to understand and some function are not free. In this case, we asked Tas and try to make our idea possible in our own way. For example, we want to make our car be unbeatable after one collision and flash. We made our car unable to touch and disappear a while and appear a while to create a flash scene. However, suddenly we found that there is a flash function, then we had to modify it. Finally, we successfully make a playable endless which brings more possibility to players. We overcome some difficulties and avoid some difficulties. We set random vehicles, which could give the game more possibilities like survive from besiege after enemies collide with others. We create a loop background to make the game have long enough play time. We give the red car a smooth control to give player chance to find gap to avoid their surround. I believe all of these elements could make our game innovative.

Although there were so many problem and difficulties, we believe we did our best to create a good playable game.

Â 

Xuqi and I made lots of changes in our game on July 26, when Kaisen is on flight back to China, so there maybe some differences between his statement and our game.

ark:/13030/qt63t0c2k5.title: The Phone Booth of Time
ark:/13030/qt63t0c2k5.description:
The Phone Booth of Time

The player is trapped in a phone booth.  You check your phone, but your batteries just ran out.  You also found some quarters in your pocket.  Great. You can use the telephone booth.  You also realize that you have the option to call to the past, present, or the future with this telephone booth.  
Manage your hunger and quarters to make your way out of this mess!
Try to find out the whole story behind this tragedy!
What ending you can unlock is up to you... 
You can choose the fate of the character...

ark:/13030/qt640765c3.title: Otherworld Dungeon
ark:/13030/qt640765c3.description:
Otherworld Dungeon by Dalton Nham
Otherworld Dungeon is an open world RPG-based game where you fight monsters and complete quests, reincarnated in a new world.

ark:/13030/qt6454651g.description:
Theme words used Soulmate, Deer
Reason for Designing this Game
Iâm a summer session student, and I stayed in UCSC for approx.10 days. The first thing that impressed me in here is that you can see deers everywhere on campus, even in front of your dormitories. I liked them and tried to be friend with them, but I failed to get closer to them every time. Therefore, after I heard the keyword about deer, I decided to make a game with deer.
The second reason for designing this game is due to the fact that my English skills are not that good. I thought Iâm not sufficient to make a complicated and mysterious game. Also, most of my friends are already combining their games with survival moods, mathematical questions, and lots of heavy topics. So I decided to make a light-weighted sweet game for kids.
Links
Links are used for basically two purposes in this game. First, some links are just button to move to the next passages, next stories. They just move players to another situation or themes. Second, thereâre some links for players to make choices. Depending on their choices, the affinity between them and deer can increase, or they might fail.
Endings&Design Goal
This game has one hidden ending for fun, but it basically has only one end. It might not be desirable because regardless of the decisions they make, every player will eventually end up in the same ending. But I have to purpose to design my game in this way.
First, basically I designed this game for kids, and I thought players have to feel success eventually.
They might have various player experiences depending on what choices player made in the middle. Even though two main failure messages are not an ending itself, they might be treated as a sub-ending where players have to start from the beginning. Even though the end is fixed to success, there might be some difficulties and differences to reach there.
Player Experiences.
I want players to feel both difficulties of making a friend(or becoming a friend with deer, specifically) and kind of happiness when they succeeded to take a selfie with deer. For some initial failures, they might feel difficult to become a friend with them, but eventually, all of the players are going to have positive results. Also, I added some jokes and âjust go to sleepâ passages for fun.
Feedbacks&Updates
First feedback is that the overall gameâs mood is not well represented. I only had textures and links in my alpha version, so the game itself doesnât feel like interacting with deer. Therefore, I added background pieces of music and many pictures for players to acknowledge situations about each paragraph.
Second, for failures and going back to first, many steps are actually unnecessary. For example, If some player failed in the second phase, they had to pass phase 1 to try differently in phase 2. This iterative works made players get bored. Therefore, to remove repeated works players had to be done, I fixed some links between them and grouped contents in passages with an if-else statement to remove redundant works.

ark:/13030/qt6456d4v6.title: Choices
ark:/13030/qt6456d4v6.description:
Choices by Dylan Higashionna
Choices follows the choices made by the child of a fiend lord. The player must make decisions and attempt to come to a conclusion about the state of the world. Will the player choose to save or destroy the humans?

ark:/13030/qt64f6s1zw.title: The journey
ark:/13030/qt64f6s1zw.description: âThe journeyâ is an educational game aiming to prove that reading can be an enjoyable and interactive process.  My game is based on the book âThe Little Princeâ by Antoine de Saint-ExupÃ©ry.  The goal of my game is to introduce this book to modern American young adults in an interactive manner through its gamification, to support readers and amplify the emotional and thought-provoking impact of the book.

ark:/13030/qt64x886vk.title: Frozen Memories
ark:/13030/qt64x886vk.description: Frozen Memories is a game about Nina, a senior citizen affected by Alzheimer's disease who tries to prove to her son that she does not need to live in a nursing home.

ark:/13030/qt6597h1v6.title: Last Chance
ark:/13030/qt6597h1v6.description: Last Chance is an escape type of game, the character was trapped in the abandoned city after a deadly virus outbreak. The character was locked inside of the lab and surround by infectors and he needs to find a way out of the city. This game aims to make the player feels frustrated and confused when they couldn't find the right way.

ark:/13030/qt65d1p2r1.title: Cosmic Cats From Meow-ter Space
ark:/13030/qt65d1p2r1.description: Cosmic Cats From Meow-ter Space is a sci-fi adventure game where players navigate the landscape using the arrow keys. The goal is to collect stars to fill up the progress bar, while avoiding enemy spaceships and asteroids. The game progressively gets harder, as there are more enemies which have the ability to shoot turrets at the player.

ark:/13030/qt6655r0ct.title: The Kingdom
ark:/13030/qt6655r0ct.description: You play as a peacekeeper, and your job is to unify the 4 kingdoms

ark:/13030/qt6688t1f4.title: Subscription Canceling Simulator
ark:/13030/qt6688t1f4.description: You are tasked with canceling a subscription through a disgruntled customer service representative. This game aims to expose the mental strain put on those who handle customer service, and the idea that many don't realize it's a person behind the screen.

ark:/13030/qt66n1g49b.title: Murder & Memories
ark:/13030/qt66n1g49b.description: Murder & Memories is a game in which the player plays as the detective. The detective is inspecting the house where his best friend Linda was murdered. As the detective goes around the house, he recalls many memories he had with Linda. There is content that the player may find disturbing or material that the player may be sensitive to. Beware of the surprise. I repeat: BEWARE OF THE SURPRISE!

ark:/13030/qt678174nk.title: Fortune Cookie Factory
ark:/13030/qt678174nk.description:
Fortune Cookie Factory by Matthew Herrera
Fortune Cookie Factory tells the story of a love triangle where you play as the character Finn, who is currently struggling with how to deal with this situation.

ark:/13030/qt67b1879h.title: Memoir
ark:/13030/qt67b1879h.description: You wake up in a beautiful house. Everything is picturesque and lovely, however, there is one problem. You don't remember a thing. You go throughout the house clicking on objects to gain some small snippets of your memory. However there's a note with a time on the nightstand. will you regain your memory in time?

ark:/13030/qt67c2r7jc.title: D u k
ark:/13030/qt67c2r7jc.description: D u k is a short video game about controlling a duck swimming in a pond. The player uses the arrow keys to move the duck around in order to eat bread (which increases the duck's size and the player's score) and avoid trash (which takes the duck's health and makes the duck smaller and slower)

ark:/13030/qt67s109r9.title: SCP Escape
ark:/13030/qt67s109r9.description:
âSCP Escapeâ is a decrypt and escape game located in the SCP foundation prison and based on the SCP series. This game explores different types of SCP characters and continues to interact with characters to find a way out.

You are the most vulnerable human character as a class-D member in the game that got trap in SCP foundation prison that contains anti-human characters. You may need to avoid being killed by anti-human characters and escape from the prison safely during the breakout.

ark:/13030/qt6887d3np.title: A Murder Story (file name is Horror Game)
ark:/13030/qt6887d3np.description: The game is about going to a cabin in Big Bear mountains with your best friend Marshall and you are confronted by a masked man with intentions to kill both of you. The player's job is to get their desired ending by choosing dialogue and survival options carefully.

ark:/13030/qt68g3555j.title: Who Are You
ark:/13030/qt68g3555j.description: The player one day wakes up, realizing that they don't recognize who they are. The game takes the player through to find who they are, who they were in the past, as well as questioning who they want to be in the future.

ark:/13030/qt68j4r0j6.title: Way Back Home
ark:/13030/qt68j4r0j6.description:
Way Back Home by Jorge Gonzalez
The setting takes place in the Wild West on a hot day. The player is a cowboy who has been kidnapped by a couple of bandits that stole their money. After being left in the desert unconscious by the bandits, the player will walk through the desert and come across a choice of paths. They will have the opportunity to decide which one to take in order to get back home. However, if they take a wrong decision in their path, they might encounter danger.

ark:/13030/qt68k033pv.title: Milk
ark:/13030/qt68k033pv.description: Milk is a short story about the protagonist running out of milk for their cereal. They must drive to the store to refresh their milk supplies, until some unnatural phenomena begin to occur.

ark:/13030/qt6bh6f12x.title: Turtle Quest
ark:/13030/qt6bh6f12x.description: Turtle Quest is a game about collecting items. Vincent has a dream of becoming a turtle, and will do anything to make his dream come true. When a genie offers to turn him into a turtle for 7 gold, Vincent sets out to find them at all costs.

ark:/13030/qt6bn0h18s.title: Explore Japan
ark:/13030/qt6bn0h18s.description: My game is to explore Japan, such as how the train works, famous Japanese food, map of Japan, and famous sightseen areas.

ark:/13030/qt6bq3k7s6.title: The Boat
ark:/13030/qt6bq3k7s6.description: You wake up with no memory on a boat in the middle of the ocean. In order to survive, you must explore and gather resources. Slowly you start to understand the sinister reason you found yourself on this boat.

ark:/13030/qt6dv7q7dk.title: Ignorance is Strength
ark:/13030/qt6dv7q7dk.description:
You wake up on the morning of your midterm to find there is a narrator doing a play by play on your every move.
Why is he here?
What does he want?
Why is he overly describing things I pass while walking?
You will soon learn that it is not the narrator you should be worried about,
But the choices you make based on the information he gives you.

ark:/13030/qt6ff7f89t.title: Zenith
ark:/13030/qt6ff7f89t.description:
Zenith by Sam Rossi
You are a mountain climber on the last leg of your ascent to the summit of a high mountain peak. You must try to reach the summit before nightfalls or before you freeze as the bitter frost rolls in. Following multiple paths, you choose how you wish to make it up the mountain.

ark:/13030/qt6g397557.title: Gone Camping
ark:/13030/qt6g397557.description: In this game the player and his/her roommate go on a camping trip. The player is given an inventory and many choices on how to make the most of this camping trip. Will the player be ready and able to face the natural and supernatural forces that lurk in the woods?

ark:/13030/qt6g5648rv.title: Spirits
ark:/13030/qt6g5648rv.description: Spirits is an adventure game where the player is brought into a world where there are two beasts that control the land and the sea. The player can get skills based upon paths they choose, and these skills affect how they interact with the beasts. The endings change based upon which skills you confront the beasts with,  aiming to give the player an adventurous freedom where they can control the ways they interact with the world.

ark:/13030/qt6gh6k598.description:
Deer would be my inspiration for this game. To be honest, I do not have much experience with deer, growing up, there might be 3 or maybe 4 times where I encounter deer in real life. But in game, many times. There are two variants of deers in games. One, an easy target, practice tool for a beginner. Or the peace lover with enormous power yet only use it to protect the nature/forest it loves dearly. So I went with the second approach.

Overall, this game is pretty much a hero game, well at least the beginning of a hero game. This is just the part where the player starts in bigger games. The main thing I wanted to express in the story, especially toward the end, was that only those who really care for the land are worth to process the power.  There are many choices within the game will lead to bad endings but I believe that is how trials in real life work. Maybe one wrong choice will lead to a bad consequence. Games nowadays will make you the main character as you did some good, blah blah blah. Yet there are no actual procedures where you become the main character. In my game, NO. your action decides where you will go. Be the main character for maybe my next game. Or made the wrong choices and get punished for it

ark:/13030/qt6gj5q2v6.title: Alaska Encounter
ark:/13030/qt6gj5q2v6.description: Hunter in Alaska comes across a strange being and must make the navigate the situation.

ark:/13030/qt6gm6p03j.description:
I choose the word 'soulmate' as the theme of my game.
As the player solves riddles, he will meet someone who will be his soulmate.

I wanted the player to concentrate on my game, so I use the way that answers with the question using prompt function.
Also I recommended them to use google, so I hoped that they are interested in the way that game goes.
I take a house structure that game map is composed of several rooms.
There are traps that they will be moved into the first part of my game or normal rooms that can solve problems.
